title: xioxian
author: xioxian
content: Good evening all.I have a few S9s that I'm mining on with unmineable, every few hours i seem to get this error here's the code, any help would be great.Code:    Noise handshake Connection shutdown2023-05-02T22:34:37.704620Z  WARN bosminer::client::stratum_v2: dev-fee:stratum2+tcp://bdf_000.kRWMBcp9s8cA_wIA@sha256-US.unmineable.com: Noise handshake Connection shutdownCaused by:    Noise handshake Connection shutdown2023-05-02T22:35:11.842612Z  INFO bosminer::hub::monitor: Trying to pause mining2023-05-02T22:35:11.885281Z  INFO bosminer_am1_s9::power: Disabling voltage2023-05-02T22:35:11.985150Z  INFO bosminer_am1_s9::power: Disabling voltage2023-05-02T22:35:12.093504Z  INFO bosminer_am1_s9::power: Disabling voltage2023-05-02T22:36:05.677665Z  WARN handshake Connection shutdown Theyre hashing at full speed and the pool shows as dead when this happens yet upon restart the pools work fine?TIA guys.

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: Have you tried to use their global server or the alternative server?Maybe their custom server to a specific country is not more stable than using the global or alternate server.Another thing that I notice is that the URL you are using is different from their guide I mean the stratum2 on that URL maybe need to remove the 2 on that pool URL.Check the guide here https://unmineable.com/support/article/how-to-setup-antminer-for-asic-mining/
